event-group.description: Player Abilities // Player Movement // Player Dead
event-group.title: Player - (Functions)

sub-events.comment: Functions _______________________________________________ _______________________________________________ ---------PLAYER ABILITY--------- -"playerAbilityCharge" - charges player abilities -"playerAbilityDash" - Dash -"playerAbilityFloatDown" - Slower decent down -"playerAbilityStomp" - player Stomp -"playerInDanger" - slow mo _______________________________________________ _______________________________________________ ---------PLAYER MOVEMENT--------- -"playerMoveLeft" - moves Left -"playerMoveRight" - moves Right -"playerJumpingUp" - jumps -"playerFallThrough" - Jumps down (only on platfroms with jumpthru behaviour) -"playerRunning" - Increases player speed -"playerLadderUp" - Climb up ladder -"playerLadderDown" - Climb down ladder _______________________________________________ _______________________________________________ ---------Player Interaction--------- -"playerInteract" - Player Interacts _______________________________________________ _______________________________________________ ---------FAIL STATE--------- -"playerFail" - Restarts layout (needs to be updated later on for checkpoints) -""
On Function Called ----> PlayerMask's "IsInDanger" is set to true + wait 3 seconds + PlayerMask's "IsInDanger" is set to False
if "IsInDanger" ----> Game Speed set 90% slower + Zooms in by 2x
if "IsInDanger" ----> Game Speed set to the normal speed + Zooms back out to 1x scale

event-group.description: (COMPLETE) Left // Right // Jump // Fall // Fall Through // Run
event-group.title: Player - Functions - Player Movement

event-group.title: Player - Controls - Functions - (playerFallThrough)

event-group.description: On Function Called - Player Climbs Down Ladder

sub-events.comment: if the instance Bool is true ----> The camera will centre to the "PlayerMask" sprite @ 5% the speed
If "IsInDanger" is true - set Vignette effect to be ENABLED
if "IsInDanger is "false - set Vignette effect to be DISABLED
